alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 4:39PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southern Piscataquis and central Penobscot Counties... At 438 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Blanchard to 7 miles east of Lake View Plantation...and moving southeast AT 10 MPH. Locations impacted include... Dover-Foxcroft, Greenville, Guilford, Howland, Brownville Junction, Milo, Monson, Blanchard, White Cap Mountain, Ebeemee, Elliottsville, Lake View Plantation, Kingsbury Plantation, Lincoln Township, Enfield, Sangerville, Brownville, Parkman, Abbot and Sebec. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 221 and 228. State Highway 11 between Milo and West Seboeis. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. * Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are occurring in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis
